faqs.question: What documents are needed to apply for car insurance?
faqs.answer: You need a valid driver's license, vehicle registration, and a proof of address.

faqs.question: How can I file a claim?
faqs.answer: You can file a claim through our mobile app, website, or by calling our 24/7 claim line.

faqs.question: What is the waiting period for health insurance?
faqs.answer: The waiting period is typically 30 days from the date of policy issuance.

faqs.question: Can I add a new driver to my car insurance policy?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can add a new driver by contacting our customer service.

faqs.question: When are you open?
faqs.answer: We are open Monday to Friday from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM, and Saturday from 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM. We are closed on Sundays.

faqs.question: How can I contact customer service?
faqs.answer: You can reach us via phone at 1-800-555-0199 or email us at support@example.com.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept credit cards, debit cards, and bank transfers.

faqs.question: Do you offer discounts for multiple policies?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a 10% discount if you purchase multiple policies with us.

faqs.question: How can I update my personal information?
faqs.answer: You can update your information through our online portal or by contacting customer service.

faqs.question: What address should I use for correspondence?
faqs.answer: Please use our main office address: 123 Insurance Lane, Suite 100, Cityville, ST 12345.

policies.name: Comprehensive Car Insurance
policies.details: Covers damage to your vehicle, third-party liability, theft, and natural disasters.

policies.name: Health Insurance Basic
policies.details: Provides coverage for general physician visits, basic hospitalization, and emergency services.
